doc:
Thomas Carroll (martial artist) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thomas_Carroll_(martial_artist) 0 Thomas "Lapuppet" Carroll, (7 February 1938 – 20 March 1999) was a pioneer African-American martial artist, and also a member of USA Karate Hall of Fame, and the Black Belt Hall of Fame. of Brooklyn, NY. He was also a member of the US Ju-Jitsu Federation. but focussed on Shotokan karate. Carrol died from cancer in March 1999. Thomas_"_Lapuppet_"_Carroll , ( 7_February_1938 – 20_March_1999 ) was a_pioneer_African-American_martial_artist , and also a_member of USA_Karate_Hall of Fame , and the_Black_Belt_Hall of Fame . of Brooklyn , NY . He was also a_member of the_US_Ju-Jitsu_Federation . but focussed on Shotokan_karate . Carrol died from cancer in March_1999 .
